thread.title: Haines: Media's dissection of Longhorns after loss to Notre Dame made 'us all mad'
thread.title_full: Haines: Media's dissection of Longhorns after loss to Notre Dame made 'us all mad' | Dallas Morning News

author: Chuck Carlton
title: Haines: Media's dissection of Longhorns after loss to Notre Dame made 'us all mad'
text:
If the Texas opening loss to Notre Dame wasn't bad enough, the coaching staff provided a different game tape to the players before the Rice game â“ with the electronic media dissecting the Longhorns.
"It makes us all mad," junior safety Dylan Haines said. "You look at all those reporters or analysts or whatever, and they're looking at us from the outside: 'This is a horrible team. They're just not that good. They're just not recovering. They're a bottom-25 team.'"
